948440.name: Hinedere Beat OST + Hinedere Beats: Jazzish
948440.description:
Hinedere Beats: Jazzish

The soundtrack for versions 1.8 and 1.9 (and later) of Hinedere Beat. It’s a compilation of remixes of songs that I made between 2010-2011 and reworked instrumentals of anison remixes I've made a few months prior to releasing this album.

The original versions of all of these songs contained samples of music that I did not compose, perform, and record. For the versions of the songs that appear in-game, I removed all instances of samples that I did not compose, perform, and record before replacing them with pieces that I played using electronic instruments (ex. jamming the koto and shamisen with ps1/midi quality on my midi-keyboard and running them through effects to imitate a vinyl recording), electric guitar, or bass guitar. Nearly everything that I did compose, perform and record for those songs was left alone.

Tracklist:

1. 2faded (Jazzish) - 01:14
2. Left Lanin' It (Jazzish) - 01:12
3. Out There (Jazzish) - 01:03
4. Turn (Jazzish) - 01:03
5. Cherry Blossom Funk (Jazzish) - 01:18
6. Fuzz Fused (Jazzish) - 00:54
7. Yep (Jazzish) - 01:24
8. Lose (Jazzish) - 01:40
9. Elevatin' (Jazzish) - 00:56
10. To Tell (Jazzish) - 01:02
11. Eat (Jazzish) - 01:06
12. What's On It? (Jazzish) - 01:13
13. False (Jazzish) 01:17
14. Today (Jazzish) 01:03
15. No (Jazzish) 01:03
16. Right (Jazzish) 01:00


Hinedere Beat OST

The soundtrack used for versions 1 and 1.4 of Hinedere Beat. Some of the tracks are chiphop remixes I've made of tracks I've composed and previously posted on my SoundCloud page and released in an album I originally made outside of game development under different titles.

Tracklist:

1. Kurukuru - 02:00
2. Kata - 02:19
3. Kirei - 01:29
4. Kedo - 01:48
5. Korei - 01:56
6. Koe - 01:47
7. Kunoichi - 01:44
8. Kengi - 01:55
9. Kijin - 01:16
10. Koi - 01:46
